woman named celia shows up attacks him . celia priestess new cult attempting resurrect dracula . since soma already proved once before he capable foiling resurrection dark lord , cult decides eliminate him before he mess up their plans well . soma survives attack quite easily celia forced retreat . apparently soma doesn't take kindly people who try kill him , so he sets out find celia prevent her reviving dracula . entire game takes place cult base , which replica dracula castle . true castlevania form you'll start off relatively weak , only knife some mediocre armor . you progress through areas castle , you'll fight monsters search mazelike hallways where you'll gain experience , well find new better equipment . you gain experience , you'll level up your stats increase attack , defense , strength , constitution , intelligence , luck . throughout game you'll also collect souls monsters you kill . these souls equipped give soma new abilities . there three types souls you equip , well ability-type souls grant you special powers without equip them . ability souls collected when you defeat bosses , these abilities usually required progress through game . using these ability souls soma learn how double-jump , move underwater , break crystal blocks -- all which required access certain areas castle . castlevania : dawn sorrow sticks close tried-and-true formula , so it instant hit anyone affinity sort explorative gameplay series known . while it doesn't much distinguish itself first castlevania ds , updated look , excellent music , added controls help refine series even further . bottom line : whether you're familiar series or not , you can't go wrong dawn sorrow .	1

i hesitated good while before picking this game up bargain price . based upon various reviews player feedback , i assumed this game would like 10 hours long , bit buggy , dumbed down . fortunately , none this case . i some good fun this over weekend ( yes , it finished over weekend ) didn't come across single bug . fable not same league morrowind , oblivion , gothic 2 , or some other great roleplaying games ( rpg ) out there , but it provide enjoyable diversion . gameplay : controls typical wasd keys mouse commands found most single-player rpgs . game fairly easy learn navigate . story traces hero childhood through adulthood , when he'll , you know , save world . there no character classes per se , but you roughly play warrior , magic-user , or stealth/archer character , or some mixture these . much story centers around main quest line , but there number side quests available . unlike most rpgs , quests assigned quest cards you pick up heroes guild ( lol ! that what it actually called ) . it rather artificial-feeling system , but it functional . progression game quite linear . most instances , you not able even leave beaten patch , since fences , rocks , invisible barriers won't allow it . compared more open-ended rpgs like elder scrolls series , fable seems restrictive light weight this regard . overall , it decent story , but it rather force-fed you . game includes several interesting touches . people react you based upon whether you've performed good or bad deeds . if you roleplay like saint , you'll eventually halo butterflies floating around . ladies ( guys ) worship you , you option buy home marry ( multiple times if you'd like ) . if you play evil character , you'll eventually grow horns fall out favor polite company . nonplayer characters game , least towns , jobs schedules . they work during day sleep night , though only quest-related characters anything say interest . although you only play game same guy , you customize him tattoos , facial hair , haircuts , ( small ) assortment armor . you control how your character skills develop , but not deeply you game like morrowind or baldur gate . there other small things you , such fish , play games chance , treasure hunt . overall , this game takes 20-25 hours everything it offer , so it rather short rpg . things i didn't much care not major , but simply underscore light-weight nature this particular game . game certainly designed appeal adolescent crowd , hotkeys burping , farting , so forth . various tattoo styles haircuts further highlight this point . there nothing really offensive game ; it just feels bit immature places . also , save system based mostly checkpoint model . you can't save just anywhere ( least your quest progress not save ) , but game autosave important junctures . graphics : game looks quite good . character models convincing ( though bit cartoonish often repeated ) , natural environment screenshot beautiful some places . since pathing fairly restrictive , much scenary noninteractive . it not like oblivion or gothic 2 , where if you see it then you probably travel it . sounds : voice acting pretty good , usual british accents invariably seem accompany such games . music particularly well appropriate various atmospheres . ambiant sounds also decent . replayability/technical issues : game probably worth playing twice : once good guy once bad guy . it play similarly either way , but there different ways perform certain quests depending your moral disposition . technically , game perfectly stable my computer -- no freezes , crashes , or other problems . manual decent explains much game , in-game tutorial . if you like rpg games get this one cheap , go it . it well-polished , though simple , rump through fairly well rendered world . don't expect same character depth , engrossing story , or exploring options you'll find some games i mentioned above . however , fable : lost chapters good several hours entertainment .	-1

overview : jedi outcast star wars first-person shooter . game one-player quest , well several different multiplayer modes . review : put it simply , this game everything original dark forces should . while not perfect , this game huge improvement over its predecessors . once again you play role kyle katarn , agent other dark forces titles . second death star destroyed , but many imperial forces still fight , so it up you infiltrate their hideouts exterminate them . graphics , most part , solid . i impressed how good they this kind game . nothing state-of-the-art , but they're still pretty damn good . control also given overhaul rightfully so , since this game lets you use force powers wield lightsaber . single-player mode extremely entertaining , fact game offers multiplayer options only adds overall value package . you save whenever you want single-player mode ! but , course , game isn't perfect . like earlier dark forces games , level design just not good . too many areas look alike , there too many instant death spots just too easy fall into . likewise , many cases your objectives unclear , some puzzles pain - i don't know you , but i buy first-person shooters shoot people , not solve puzzles ! because imbalanced puzzles often poor level design , it took me over hour just beat first level ! huge problem availability . lack custom control configuration also plagues game . this huge problem , since game limited control selections often clash what you're used this sort game . this game wasn't released consoles very high quanitites , so you're likely gonna shell out full new price just get used copy - my mind , it not worth price . sad but true . i recommend this game star wars fans , just warned it not perfect , it hard get copy . edition notes : this good game , but some strange reason it just wasn't available consoles very long . because this , even used copies fetch close original new retail price . this extremely annoying people like me who want get every star wars game . still , you should hunt it down if you're into this sort thing . overall : overall this best game dark forces sub-series thusfar . where game succeeds , it succeeds beautifully . i am impressed game , it just shame consular version not made readily available all would-be players . i strongly recommend this game if you get hold it - i doubt it disappoint any star wars fan	-1

you fight your way map map . unlike other rpg games , your hero won't able go it alone ; defeat foes lay their path , he/she call upon power armies six different races : human , elves , dwarves , orcs , trolls , dark elves . your avatar must find structures known rune monuments access his/her unique power using runes summon forth rune heroes armies . rpg element game limited essentially character you create beginning . your avatar , rune warrior , remnant powerful heroes served circle mages during time convocation . avatar completely under your control ; you choose name , equipment , gender , distribute skill points stat points they gain levels create unique character . you create punishing melee fighter , powerful sorcerer , deadeye archer , or any combination those other concepts . your avatar also summon rune heroes he/she goes ; these heroes other rune warriors whose levels classes fixed , so all you equip them best available items . you progress through game , you find more powerful hero runes summon better heroes hero monuments . rts element continuation system started warcraft , but few twists . you must find rune monument one six races ( human monument , dwarf monument , etc . ) , possess appropriate worker rune , building plans , unit plans summon army . once you summon your workers , they gather resources build necessary structures summon army . need appropriate building unit plans occasionally necessitates fully exploring each map , so not miss any . levels your military units depends level worker rune you used summon your workers , so you find higher-level worker runes your units gain levels become stronger . heart winter shadow phoenix help add dozens hours original order dawn campaign , granting you access higher levels , more powerful equipment , new heroes , more advanced units . one my favorites " walking fortress " troll unit hurls massive boulders enemy structures . you import your avatar order dawn into both expansions , allowing this hero complete epic adventure . shadow phoenix very challenging some most ridiculous boss fights i ever seen . several them require your avatar , rune heroes , full army bring down single foe . heart winter excellent continuation order dawn , adding new friends enemies , shadow phoenix harrowing challenging test strategy patience your rune hero moves towards their ultimate destiny . sum it up , this dvd plenty adventurous rts/rpg action wrapped around engrossing fantasy yarn should provide dozens hours quality entertainment . highly recommended .	1
nintendo ds lite ( 2006 . ) introduction : late 2004 , nintendo premiered nintendo dual screen , or nintendo ds short . despite skepticism many critics fans alike , new console quickly won audiences over . it nintendo best handheld console date . 2006 , nintendo released smaller , lighter version system , appropriately called ds lite . overview : nintendo released ds lite mid 2006 . new version system smaller than old version , features repositioned buttons/switches/etc , variable brightness levels , few other changes classic ds . it retails $130.00 comes three colors - white , black , pink . review : nintendo good job revising ds . many problems older version system fixed . here some highlights flaws new version . -the good- -smaller more compact than original ds . original ds rather bulky comparison some other handhelds market , it kind pain haul around . finally , we've got smaller , lighter version system easily transported . -variable brightness levels . you adjust brightness your liking this version ds . brighter levels use more battery power , lower levels use less , so you plan out how best use your battery life . -features clip game boy advance slot . unlike original ds , lite version includes clip goes slot where game boy advance games fit . this helps give system streamlined appearance , it keeps slot cleaner . -compatible e-reader . old ds , due its shape , couldn't use e-reader accessory . lite model shape better all around , it use it ! -available three cool colors . whether you want white , black , or pink , there color everyone . -repositioned buttons things . nintendo made system more convenient use moving buttons around spots easier use . -redesigned stylus . new stylus bigger thicker than ones old ds , all-around improvement . -compatible older ds . since it basically same system , you won't any compatibility issues . -the bad- -smaller isn't necessarily better every way . i big hands they fit old ds fine . shrinking it actually makes it little harder , some aspects , use all buttons . -still not compatible pre-game boy advance games . course i wasn't really expecting nintendo fix this . -still not compatible game boy advance multiplayer . thing i wasn't expecting fixed . overall : overall this nice improvement over original ds . there problems , but most part , just same problems original . if you haven't gotten ds yet , definitely go lite model . edition notes : ds lite relatively new should stores years come .	1

half-life made its debut 1998 , it shocked entire world . half-life time featured stunning graphics , gameplay , sound . it simply one those games every gamers hands , still this date half-life game every action-game developing company carefully needs study order their games success . shortly after release once gasp world ended , two game developers joined together create game not gasped world again , but made it scream . game pits terrorists counter-terrorists fast-paced sort " s.w.a.t. " type tactical firefighting gameplay . matches consist one two types game types . first probably most popular type bomb defusal . both game types , you win either eliminating opposing team or following objective . bomb defusal random player team receive bomb each round . player plant bomb one two bomb spots or simply drop bomb teammate pick it up use it . once bomb planted counter-terrorists must defuse it regardless if terrorists eliminated . counter-terrorists usually thirty-five seconds defuse bomb win round . second type gameplay hostage rescue . terrorists must protect four hostages area map counter-terrorists rescuing them taking them their base . if hostages killed terrorists or counter-terrorists , nothing happen except now counter-terrorists must completely kill terrorists gain victory round . start each round all players few seconds quickly buy weapons money they achieved past rounds victories . both teams significant difference arsenal weapons you choose , but neither really focuses specific time gun style . all weapons game one-hundred percent realistic deadly reality . this element makes counter-strike such superior game . counter-strike without argument most popular online action game world . entire culture formed around it . so what makes it such extremely addictive popular game ? it purely because fantastically well-crafted gameplay not graphics , or game would not popular it . players around world give you many " deep " reasons why it such great game . but one without argument stands out . it simply fact versus other games , it " difficult " make kill game . what makes game so addicting pleasure killing someone after long thirty second gunfight or quick shot head , knowing dead player now experiencing some form anger he waits out rest round . element how realistic guns feel game . regardless if they fake shooting totally simulated , it superiorly well . definitely once new player game gained enough experience achieve kills least periodically , feeling " power " experienced when holding ak-47 or m4 . game quite punishing new players , total hapzard players who never played first-person shooters or video games all . but regardless stress you feel first , there absolutely no reason put down game because entry-difficulty , it almost guaranteed you get better game . there over ten maps game , each one masterpiece . all maps wildly differ each other feel action even environment . most popular all maps , de_dust2 created davej , still commonly referenced many gaming parodies , magazines , shows , etc . due its style simplicity , it godly-designed map arguably most popular map first-person shooter history . one thing helps fight player bored game simply maps . since each map superbly designed , player could easily switch one after bored continue play , different feel . game also many public map editors which 3rd parties use create custom maps . fy_iceworld awp_map some very popular maps created amateur designers . this makes counter-strike game almost " infinite " value sort feel . sound counter-strike absolutely insanely-realistic . first time player plays or even watches player play game , person definitely without doubt notice clear sounds ak-47 fire or pistol fire . not much known why guns sound so realistic , player best guess designers actually recorded live gunfire weapons . sound weapons combined look feel ; end up making player totally immersed into game feeling " power " . this sort thing extremely rare video game . time counter-strike simply jaw-dropping graphics . created all half-life engine , players amazed lighting effects how clear textures . present , game doesn't hold same , but it what past mattered . half-life one first games history some slightly complex dynamic physics . bouncing flashbang or player blown away also something time look . games before release half-life hardly any sort physics , if they , it would something very basic . counter-strike game without argument should any player hard drive . there still even thousands players since release game back 1998 , still actually play game without losing ounce boredom gameplay , that where final fantasy excels most . final fantasy iv before it , final fantasy uses atb battle system . all your characters stand one side screen while all enemies stand other . when character atb gauge fills up , you'll able issue commands . game then plays out turn based fashion . final fantasy simple , yet it lot fun , it also provides challenge . gameplay enhanced even more games complex job system . job system extremely complex , even todays standards . you progress through game you'll obtain job classes your characters . there plenty jobs . monks , thieves , white mages , black mages , plenty more . each them learn several different abilities all which useful you your journey . when you select job certain character , you'll battle earn ability points so they learn all abilities they . some abilities more useful than others , possibilities endless . also , once character learns ability , you change jobs them equip it . so black mage could , fact , use white magic , provided he learned ability it . you'll spend lot time field battling get ability points . more abilities you learn , more ability points you'll need next . this fine all , but most enemies don't give up loads ability points . so game puts huge emphasis battling . this also seen low amounts experience enemies also give off . leveling up slow process . good news battling fun , especially job system place . unless everyone jobs same , there nearly endless possibility commands you give middle battle . final fantasy advance sports same extras all previous final fantasy like future final fantasy titles , but mastering all jobs really keep you busy several hours alone . it also cool because extra dungeons bosses , you'll get four new job classes . this only adds more already complex gameplay . graphically , final fantasy little dated , even gba standards . it looks far better than it final fantasy anthology . it much smoother little bit update , but it doesn't go extra mile it could've . enemies still only flash attack your characters , they're hardly animated . least game great soundtrack . final fantasy goes show why super nintendo era final fantasy music one best series . game just sounds really good . final fantasy golden treat final fantasy fans . it may weak storyline , but what it lacks story it more than makes up gameplay . it not best series , we near end life span last generation consoles , key franchises appeared year after year begin wrap up their yearly development cycle . crazy it may sound , madden nfl 07 could one last times we see madden xbox , playstation 2 , or gamecube . mind , it not altogether surprising madden 07 doesn't really push envelope terribly far . game includes few new control features some mode tweaks ( nearly all which also available xbox 360 version this year game ) , but most part , it feels like result series pushed far it possibly go given platform , you definitely get sense madden current-generation consoles beginning wind down . however , least this last year , veteran player outraces up-and-comer xbox 360 version , there certainly enough compelling reasons check this year game out older consoles . madden nfl 07 brings back practically every feature madden 06 . top , number new gameplay upgrades brought table , majority which available all versions game . themselves , none these individual changes or upgrades particularly game changing , but taken whole , they add nice dimension depth . these features include highlight stick , new kick meter , lead blocking controls . highlight stick new version truck stick used runners offense . here , you use right control stick pull off sorts crazy jukes steps star running backs so well known , top , depending type back you're playing , you opt use more-powerful moves , or more finesse-based maneuvers . this feels like natural evolution last year truck stick , though most experienced madden players able get just easily using button-based moves rather than making liberal use stick . but if you take time learn stick figure out how use it button controls together , you very hard runner stop . new lead blocking controls likely inspire some new tactics all types players . here , while offense , you opt switch your controlled player any available blockers during running play . this includes offensive linemen , tight ends , fullbacks , or whoever else might blocking play . when blocking , you just standard blocks , or you even get dirty some mean-spirited cut blocks . this interesting mechanic , because it stops you rely cpu blockers , which any experienced player tell you , not always most reliable players field . you also quickly switch back control running back once you've laid down your block , which good , because cpu running back doesn't always manage find holes you're creating . first , you may find yourself unable effectively use this feature , setting up right blocks isn't always most intuitive thing world . but after some time , this control method gives running game really interesting new perspective , those who love finding new strategies bound eat this up . new kick meter probably most accurate representation kicking available game thus far . this meter , you use typical arrow line up your angle then press down right analog stick set up your power . meter quickly fills up , then you press forward right stick set power well your accuracy . accuracy based angle which you press up . if you press too far right or left , kick get away you . if you land it within set space , it go pretty much right where you want it . beyond , changes 06 07 mostly ancillary , fundamentally , game plays very much its predecessor . defense , there few more available options terms positioning your defensive players , you commit your defense certain direction moment ball snapped . offense , quarterback vision cone , which made its debut last year , still available , though it not required feature . you just tap right analog stick after snapping ball , it pop , letting you use it little accuracy boost . no , it not any more fun use than it last year , but that not altogether surprising . otherwise , pretty much every control feature you've come expect madden front center once again . potentially , some people could play through madden 07 never really partake new running control features , but there definitely enough all available upgrades add significant layer depth experience . even though madden nfl 07 doesn't any big , game-changing features make it especially memorable iteration series , its roster small , but useful changes ultimately more compelling than anything madden 06 offer last year . while some people undoubtedly over notion playing new games old consoles , madden 07 shows it still deliver some enjoyable football , regardless what platform it . it not big step forward , similarities this year last year might tough sell some . but it those similar aspects madden 07 ultimately improves upon over its predecessor , if you skipped out 06 , then there no good reason ignore 07 .	1

games such final fantasy . real draw this game complete freedom player whoever they want , go anywhere they like , almost anything ( within reason ) . player asked choose name , race , gender , face hairstyle their character , also create basic skill set use ( any combination combat , magical , stealth categories ) . then player given some simple instructions beginning first task main quest simply released into massive world towns , people , wilderness . there main quest follow , but gameplay completely open-ended . it easy become completely distracted caught up endless guild quests random adventures await your character . personally , i've playing this game two half years now , i've still not accomplished everything there this game . i'm not sure i even describe depth this game this review . i've literally spent hours just trying different clothes armor , creating my own spells potions , or reading books ( both factual fictional ) game libraries ( i'd like add almost anything read book found or game ) . i've also spent literally days gameplay searching various legendary unique artifacts trying uncover various mysteries game , such solving disappearance dwarves , finding cure vampirism , locating ( or becoming ) werewolf , how become necromancer ( some which i've found or am close finding ) . i've played most ( if not all ) zelda games , i've played fable , i've played games like dragon warrior final fantasy , i've even played text rpg like adom . they all their good points advantages ( i've greatly enjoyed them all ) , but none them ( not even majora mask ) held my attention this long . elder scrolls iii : morrowind best role playing game i've ever played maybe ( just maybe ) best game i've ever played overall	1

spend several hundred hours playing through disgaea : hour darkness disgaea 2 : cursed memories beat all bonus content beyond main campaign . disgaea 2 shines more polished version first disgaea . character sprites more vivid , spell effects more visual flare . music dialogue sharper audio quality . all bonus quests first disgaea expanded such inclusion dark court endless dungeon item world even more stuff dark assembly . however , it also so similar first game it feels almost like expansion pack rather than true sequel . story disgaea 2 similar first one , it highly character driven told quite bit humor . overlord zenon tranformed all residents world veldime into monsters . adell , last remaining human , embacks quest slay overlord rozalin , zenon haughty neglected daughter . way , they meet colorful cast enemies , rivals , allies they attempt crack mystery behind near-immortal zenon . it enjoyable story , if bit meandering . it one major susprise twist end caught me off guard though it probably shouldn't . combat , like most srpgs , takes place series grid-like maps , usually four chapter . characters move around so many squares per turn opportunity attack any enemies falls within their attack range . battlefields littered geo-panels , multicolored pyramids confer penalties bonuses certain areas maps . there dozens classes , both monster human , fashion powerful army out . choose wisely , because grand total 10 deployed any one time . unfortunately , experience points only go character deals final blow so level disparities characters combined steadily increasing difficulty curve make it neccesary replay some maps times . luckily , difficulty curve much more finely tuned this game , so you spend less time leveling up than first game . main campaign disgaea 2 pretty short , i clocked little over 30 hours my first play through , granted i barely touched much sidequests . i also found it little easy side . i didn't die once until i penultimate chapter . i don't know it because game easier or if it just spending over one hundred hours conquering first game . sprgs probably hardest sub-set out rpg genre . disgaea series highly recommended experienced inexperienced players alike . disgaea 2 many different systems enhance playing experience , but unlike many games , doesn't force player learn how work them all . players option playing game face value or learning all complex systems more enriched experience . this very accessable game , this genre definitely needs more games strike balance too hard or too easy .	-1

how you follow up runaway success like 2001 grand theft auto iii ? rockstar north responded year later gta : vice city , game took gameplay its predecessor expanded it considerably . same time , vice city gave series extensive amazing stylistic makeover , drenching experience sights , sounds , attitude miami , florida mid ' 80s . so where you go there ? you take it statewide . grand theft auto : san andreas expands series ' concept encompass three entire cities , well countryside them . gameplay similarly expands , packing some explosive set pieces amazing action-movie-like thrills while maintaining same remarkably fun , freefom gta feel . short , rockstar it again . san andreas definitely lives up grand theft auto name . fact , it arguably best game series . just when you think you're getting used gang warfare , everything goes sour . we're certainly not interested spoiling game many interesting plot twists , so we'll leave out details , but it should suffice say you'll eventually need get heck out los santos . you wind up country outside city , where you'll encounter many more great characters officially embark your quest put right what gone wrong . once you get out los santos , you won't really worry gang warfare while , game settles down into more gta-like feel . like previous games series , san andreas features fairly linear story takes you through game areas . you'll start off restricted los santos -- something story justifies claiming earthquake taken out bridges roads link los santos surrounding area -- but it doesn't take long unlock other two areas . game also throws some pretty great surprises form characters previous entries series . these characters tie gta games together really nicely , so while san andreas feels pretty different other games series , it still feels like you're playing same universe . game also tracks lot other statistics . respect big one , it what you'll earning most you complete missions . not all missions earn you money , but almost all them good slight respect bonus . higher respect rating lets you recruit more more gang members follow you around shoot rival gangs , which new addition nice perk , but not something comes handy very often . you're also rated lot different vehicle categories , like driving , riding motorcycles , bicycling , piloting aircraft . you use vehicle , your skill it slowly increases , which seems tighten up controls bit . case motorcycles , it also makes it less likely you'll fly off bike wreck . your bicycling skills translate into higher bunny hops . similarly , you're given stats every type firearm game . you'll start poor skills all weapons , but don't let tag " poor " fool you--cj skills feel roughly same tommy vercetti when you first squeeze trigger . after getting some time weapon , you'll upgrade it " gangster " level , which extends your lock-on range weapon , speeds up reloading , some cases lets you walk around while locked . upgrading your skill weapon highest level , " hitman , " takes relatively long time , but it extends lock-on range speeds up reloading even further , it also opens up ability dual-wield some one-handed weapons . unloading two full clips submachine-gun ammo extremely satisfying here . just like all gta games , thing makes gta go up over , freedom walk around huge map doing whatever hell you want . you dont just missions , half fun wandering around killing people ! usually , when game tries million different things , it overambitious hodge-podge can't manage get its different parts down cold . grand theft auto : san andreas you doing many , many more things than any previous gta game , while some them work little better than others , strength all these different gameplay elements -- too many count -- makes powerful package not disappoint , despite extremely high standards grand theft auto established san andreas needed live up . its strong story , well-written dialogue , terrific voice cast , impressive graphics , great in-game sound , extremely entertaining varied gameplay , grand theft auto : san andreas stupendous thrill ride shouldn't missed .	1

... not just half-baked product placement tool . bioware decision make game pre-date movies great one because it gave them considerable creative freedom , even within confines star wars brand . biggest reason why kotor won over 40 game-of-the-year awards ( yes , over 40 ) not because you get swing double-bladed lightsaber around use force powers ; it because story ! strong plot crucial every rpg , kotor doesn't disappoint . this plot course includes one biggest twists video game history ( all you fans out there know what i'm talking ! if you don't , then go out buy this game now ) . game principal characters , while somewhat stereotypical ( i.e. bastila condescending socialite snob , carth tough loner troubled past , etc ) , work very well together good chemistry , including you , created character . example , if you play female character , it soon becomes obvious carth develops feelings you , but he feels slightly guilty because he lost his wife not too long ago . you'll also find yourself acting mediator when some your allies don't get each other , i.e. canderous carth , because they fought opposite sides mandalorian wars took place five years before . aside character development , game feels very rich its " star wars-ness " -- example , some names bioware came up planets people feel sound like george lucas himself approved them . despite what i said earlier this review , cutting down your enemies lightsaber looking good doing it got one joys kotor . i admit when i first got dantooine verge becoming jedi , i trembling excitement i going build my own lightsaber , i wondered what color i going choose . said all , there some things keep this game getting 5 stars . i felt game bit linear ( able choose your planets any order only gives illusion open-ended gameplay ) . i hoping storyline would different depending whether i decide evil or good , but everything plays same , save few minor events certain conversations . also , there " doorway bug " causes you sometimes get stuck when moving through doorway or narrow corridors . when this happens you wiggle thumbstick free yourself ; i've never any real problems this bug , but it get distracting . also i found moving around menu screens problematic ; you press start go main menu , then you pull trigger buttons move screens , but often i pull trigger multiple times before game responds . also , i'm sure many people would agree game graphics not up xbox standards ; even ps2 capable doing better ! i don't usually gripe graphics , but textures some background buildings taris downright laughable . overall , i give bioware serious kudos taking daunting task like creating new star wars game , i sing their eternal praises actually making it fun . it not stretch say i bought xbox just play kotor ( few other titles , but that story ) , i'm glad i made investment . hey , stop reading this go play	-1
